TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class CompileWorkflowTask : Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task, Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompileWorkflowTask extends Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask
Public NotInheritable Class CompileWorkflowTask Inherits Task Implements ITask
public ref class CompileWorkflowTask sealed : Microsoft::Build::Utilities::Task, Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITask
type CompileWorkflowTask = class inherit Task interface ITask

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: Represents the MSBuild task of compiling a workflow.

span.span: Represents the MSBuild task of compiling a workflow.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] Essa classe estende a `Task` classe do Microsoft Build framework.This class extends the `Task` class of Microsoft Build framework. Métodos dessa classe são invocados pelo Microsoft Build framework para personalizar o processo de compilação ao compilar tipos do Windows Workflow Foundation de projetos c# e Visual Basic.Methods of this class are invoked by the Microsoft Build framework to customize the build process when compiling Windows Workflow Foundation types of C# and Visual Basic projects. Ele fornece suporte para compilação de arquivos. xoml em arquivos de código intermediário (c# ou Visual Basic).It provides support for compiling .xoml files into intermediate code files (either C# or Visual Basic). Fluxos de trabalho são validados antes da compilação.Workflows are validated before compiling.
